abstract: Vermont regulators rejected a $2.7 billion plan by FairPoint Communications to buy Verizon’s landlines in northern New England.
snippet: Vermont regulators rejected a $2.7 billion plan by FairPoint Communications to buy Verizon’s landlines in northern New England.
lead_paragraph: MONTPELIER, Vt. (AP)  Vermont regulators on Friday rejected a $2.7 billion plan by FairPoint Communications to buy Verizon’s landlines in northern New England.

headline.main: Vermont Rejects Sale of Verizon Lines
headline.print_headline: Vermont Rejects Sale Of Verizon Lines
